function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate office space for remote working","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous assembly of data from various sources","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate testing capacity for a nation’s population may lead to slow and incomplete assessment of infection status, allowing for undetected spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate forecasting","category":"Economic diseases within the population.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reproductive number r greater than 1","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Manual enforcement difficulties","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contact transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Optimizing hyperparameters using grid search","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise in the number of infected nurses and harm.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suspension of aerosols up to 10 μm in diameter indoors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fixed utility rooms between corridors","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparability of far-uvc light with conventional germicidal uv light","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data standardization","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of collaboration in studying and addressing covid-19 epidemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for more research in
